content: k2tog k8 short row 8 k7 w+tk to end - 42sts short row 9 p8 w+tp right hind leg short row 10 k9 w+tk row 31 increase cast on 5 sts pm for right hind leg purl to end - 47sts short row 11 purl to end work short row to shape left hind leg as follows continue with back shaping as follows short row 1 k6 w+tk row 32 decrease k2tog k14 skpo k9 k2tog k14 k2tog - 41sts short row 2 p1 w+tp row 33 purl short row 3 k2 w+tk row 34 decrease k2tog k13 skpo k7 k2tog k13 k2tog - 37sts short row 4 p3 w+tp row 35 purl short row 5 k4 w+tk row 36 decrease k13 skpo k7 k2tog knit to end - 35sts short row 6 p5 w+tp row 37 purl short row 7 k6 w+tk row 38 decrease k2tog k10 skpo k7 k2tog k10 k2tog - 31sts short row 8 p7 w+tp row 39 purl short row 9 k8 w+tk row 40 decrease k10 skpo k7 k2tog knit to end - 29sts short row 10 p9 w+tp row 41 purl all 29 back sts onto the circular knitting needle short row 11 decrease k15 skpo k11 k2tog k16 to end - 45sts cut all yarn work short row to shape right hind leg as follows left hind leg short row 1 p6 w+tp rs facing beginning at puppy s left hind leg marker with yarn cd short row 2 k1 w+tk pick up and knit 6 sts across row ends to the stitches on the circular short row 3 p2 w+tp needle then knit across the first 10 sts from the circular see figs 5 & short row 4 k3 w+tk 6 pick up from a to b as dotted line then knit along to c as dotted line short row 5 p4 w+tp -16sts note the remaining stitches are kept on the circular as you short row 6 k5 w+tk work the 16 sts from left hind leg as follows new born puppy pattern page 19 new born puppy pattern page 20 row 1 3 & 5 purl row 2 decrease k1 k2tog four times k4 to end - 12sts row 4 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 10sts row 6 increase cast on 12 sts for left paw k22 - 22 left hind leg sts first 10 stitches row 7 purl pm for left rear end marker on first stitch b c back stitches a left hind leg marker fig 6 fig 5 new born puppy pattern page 21 new born puppy pattern page 22 left paw right hind leg short row to shape the foot pad side 1 rs facing rejoin yarn cd to the 19 sts on the circular needle continue short row 1 increase kfb k9 w+tk as follows short row 2 p11 row 1 increase k19 then pick up and knit 6 sts across row ends to puppy s short row 3 k10
